text: Mary Wells Lawrence (born Mary Georgene Berg; May 25, 1928 - May 11, 2024) was an American advertising executive. She was the founding president of Wells Rich Greene, an advertising agency. Lawrence was the first female CEO of a company listed on the New York Stock Exchange. Lawrence died on May 11, 2024 at a hospital in London, England at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Braniff Flying Colors Historical Page * Mary Wells Lawrence at wowOwow * "Madison Avenue", BBC Adam Curtis blog discusses Wells' career and features a film about Braniff from 1967 in which Wells speaks.
